issue.title: [C++] Add support for Substrait pushdown projection
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15585](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15585). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Substrait C++ consumer does not currently handle pushdown projection in the read relation.

For some formats we can push some of this (e.g. column selection) down into the reader.

For the parts we can't push down we can use a project node after the read.
